operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO f_project_equity_structure (form_id, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, stockholder, capital_contributions, contribution_way, equity_ratio, sort_order, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE f_project_equity_structure SET form_id=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, stockholder=?, capital_contributions=?, contribution_way=?, equity_ratio=?, sort_order=? WHERE id=?

operation.name: updateProjectAndCustomerInfoByFormId
operation.sql: UPDATE f_project_equity_structure SET project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=? WHERE form_id=?

operation.name: findByFormId
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM f_project_equity_structure WHERE form_id=? order by sort_order

operation.name: findByProjectCode
operation.sql: SELECT * FROM f_project_equity_structure WHERE project_code=? order by sort_order
